# Read App Preview Information

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get information about an app preview and its upload and processing status.

## Listing App Previews and Reading Information

- **List All App Previews for an App Preview Set**: List all ordered app previews in a preview set.

items.description: List all ordered app previews in a preview set.
